description.zh-cn: 中国演员、歌手、主持人、出品人。
description.en: Chinese actor, singer, host, and producer.

description.zh-cn: 香港模特、演员，黄晓明的前妻。
description.en: Hong Kong model and actress, ex-wife of Huang Xiaoming.

description.zh-cn: 中国乒乓球运动员，黄晓明的表妹。
description.en: Chinese table tennis player, cousin of Huang Xiaoming.

description.zh-cn: 中国演员，黄晓明的初恋女友。
description.en: Chinese actress, Huang Xiaoming's first love girlfriend.

description.zh-cn: 中国演员，黄晓明的前女友。
description.en: Chinese actress, former girlfriend of Huang Xiaoming.

description.zh-cn: 中国女演员，黄晓明的前女友。
description.en: Chinese actress, former girlfriend of Huang Xiaoming.

description.zh-cn: 中国女演员，黄晓明的前女友。
description.en: Chinese actress, former girlfriend of Huang Xiaoming.

description.zh-cn: 中国网红，黄晓明的前女友。
description.en: Chinese internet celebrity, former girlfriend of Huang Xiaoming.

description.zh-cn: 中国演员，曾与黄晓明传出绯闻。
description.en: Chinese actress, who was rumored to be in a relationship with Huang Xiaoming.

description.zh-cn: 深圳商人，叶珂的前夫。
description.en: Businessman from Shenzhen, ex-husband of Ye Ke.

description.zh-cn: 中国演员、导演、制片人。
description.en: Chinese actor, director, and producer.

description.zh-cn: 中国电影人才的摇篮，黄晓明的母校。
description.en: The cradle of Chinese film talent, alma mater of Huang Xiaoming.

zh-cn: 华谊兄弟文化经纪公司

description.zh-cn: 中国大陆的综合性娱乐集团。
description.en: A comprehensive entertainment group in mainland China.

zh-cn: 东阳易星传媒有限公司

description.zh-cn: 黄晓明于2010年创办的个人工作室。
description.en: Personal studio founded by Huang Xiaoming in 2010.

description.zh-cn: 香港的一家唱片公司及娱乐集团。
description.en: A record company and entertainment group in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 联合国一个专门为发展中国家的母亲和孩子提供人道主义和发展援助的机构。
description.en: A United Nations agency responsible for providing humanitarian and developmental aid to children worldwide.

description.zh-cn: 中国山东省下辖副省级市，黄晓明的出生地。
description.en: A sub-provincial city in Shandong Province, China, and the birthplace of Huang Xiaoming.

description.zh-cn: 黄晓明与Angelababy于2015年5月27日结婚，2022年1月28日宣布离婚。
description.en: Huang Xiaoming married Angelababy on May 27, 2015, and they announced their divorce on January 28, 2022.

description.zh-cn: 陈梦是黄晓明的表妹。
description.en: Chen Meng is Huang Xiaoming's cousin.

description.zh-cn: 黄晓明于2000年毕业于北京电影学院表演系本科班。
description.en: Huang Xiaoming graduated from the undergraduate program of the Performing Arts Department at Beijing Film Academy in 2000.

description.zh-cn: 黄晓明于2007年至2010年签约华谊兄弟文化经纪公司。
description.en: Huang Xiaoming was signed with Huayi Brothers Culture and Brokerage Co. from 2007 to 2010.

description.zh-cn: 黄晓明于2010年离开华谊兄弟后，与经纪人共同创办个人工作室。
description.en: After leaving Huayi Brothers in 2010, Huang Xiaoming co-founded his personal studio with his manager.

description.zh-cn: 黄晓明于2007年至2010年签约大国文化集团作为其唱片公司。
description.en: Huang Xiaoming was signed to Music Nation Group as his record company from 2007 to 2010.

description.zh-cn: 黄晓明在大学期间与李钰交往，李钰是其初恋女友。
description.en: Huang Xiaoming dated Li Yu during his university years; she was his first love girlfriend.

description.zh-cn: 2000年至2004年，黄晓明和大学同班同学刘立淇交往并同居。
description.en: From 2000 to 2004, Huang Xiaoming dated and lived with his university classmate Liu Liqi.

description.zh-cn: 黄晓明于2003年与秦岚因拍摄《龙票》相恋，2006年11月28日承认分手。
description.en: Huang Xiaoming fell in love with Qin Lan in 2003 while filming 'Long Piao' and admitted their breakup on November 28, 2006.

description.zh-cn: 黄晓明于2007年因合作《鹿鼎记》与李菲儿交往，2010年分手。
description.en: Huang Xiaoming dated Li Fei'er after collaborating on 'Royal Tramp' in 2007; they broke up in 2010.

description.zh-cn: 李菲儿曾公开指责Angelababy是她与黄晓明之间的第三者。
description.en: Li Fei'er publicly accused Angelababy of being the third party in her relationship with Huang Xiaoming.

description.zh-cn: 黄晓明在与Angelababy离婚后与网红叶珂交往，期间分合，最终于2025年8月确认分手。
description.en: After divorcing Angelababy, Huang Xiaoming dated internet celebrity Ye Ke. They had an on-and-off relationship and finally confirmed their breakup in August 2025.

description.zh-cn: 2023年中，黄晓明和赵仕瑾被多次拍到约会。
description.en: In mid-2023, Huang Xiaoming and Zhao Shijin were spotted on dates multiple times.

description.zh-cn: 叶珂于2022年与深圳商人王命金离婚。
description.en: Ye Ke divorced Shenzhen businessman Wang Mingjin in 2022.

description.zh-cn: 在叶珂与黄晓明恋情公开后，其前夫王命金公开指控其造谣诽谤，并暗示叶珂婚内出轨。
description.en: After Ye Ke's relationship with Huang Xiaoming became public, her ex-husband Wang Mingjin publicly accused her of slander and defamation, implying she had an affair during their marriage.

description.zh-cn: 2013年，黄晓明以电影《中国合伙人》与张国立并列获得第29届金鸡奖最佳男主角奖。
description.en: In 2013, Huang Xiaoming co-won the Best Actor award at the 29th Golden Rooster Awards with Zhang Guoli for the film 'American Dreams in China'.

description.zh-cn: 2009年8月5日，联合国儿童基金会香港委员会委任黄晓明为爱心大使。
description.en: On August 5, 2009, the Hong Kong Committee for UNICEF appointed Huang Xiaoming as a Goodwill Ambassador.
